Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and innovative technology, this product stands out in its category. I believe it would greatly benefit your daily activities or projects. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $150. This is an opportunity to own a top-of-the-line item at a special discounted rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your experience. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
